Html:
Hi,

I can't figure out what units the height and width should be for a drawing object in PHPExcel. Is it pixels, cm?

:S

$objDrawing->setWidthAndHeight(73,3);

Appreciate the help.

Sid.

The answer is pixels. Note that internally this is converted to PHP's quirky internal units when saving, based on an assumption of 72dpi. If your objects are images with a different print resolution, they may appear mis-sized when opening a saved file.
